com.googlecode.objectify.impl.save
Class FieldSaver

java.lang.Object
  com.googlecode.objectify.impl.save.FieldSaver
All Implemented Interfaces:
Saver
Direct Known Subclasses:
EmbeddedClassFieldSaver, EmbeddedMultivalueFieldSaver, LeafFieldSaver
public abstract class FieldSaver
extends java.lang.Object
implements Saver

Most savers are related to a particular type of field. This provides a convenient base class.
